item.title: Mathematical Modeling and Control of Epidemics
item.description: Modeled the COVID-19 pandemic using nonlinear differential equations with a view to better control a potential breakout of a new variant of COVID or any other virus. In particular, data for the case of Mauritius has been used to propose a Model Predictive Control approach to mitigate its impact. There is room for further work using data-driven control approach. Please reach out if interested to collaborate/undertake further studies in the area.

item.title: A Mathematical Characterisation of COVID-19 in Mauritius
